h: Two die in separate Road accidents
Five killed in Road accidents in city
sub_h: Rash driving in Ahmedabad resulted in five fatal accidents on Tuesday, with three of the deceased being elderly persons. Two of these accidents occurred on the SP Ring Road.

h: Ahmedabad car accident: Bright futures crushed at 120kmph
sub_h: Hours after a speeding SUV cut short the lives of nine young Amdavadis, 19-year-old Tathya Patel, who was behind the wheels of the killer vehicle, and his father were taken to the accident site on Iskcon flyover to reconstruct the crime on Thursday. Surrounded by the police and media, the two caught hold of their ears and did sit-ups in an act of remorse, but it was too little, too late to compensate for the loss of the nine lives.

h: Biker, woman die in Road accident
2 killed in separate Road accidents
Four killed in 4 separate accidents
sub_h: Four people died in four separate Road accidents in Jamnagar and Rajkot districts on Thursday. In all the four incidents, the accused drivers fled and were yet to be arrested.

h: 44% drop in Road accidents in a decade: Harsh Sanghavi
sub_h: Praising the functioning of the Gujarat Road Safety Authority, state transport minister Harsh Sanghavi said on Wednesday that the number of Road accidents in the state have dropped by 44% over the past decade.

h: Two dead in accident near Vataman
Road accident victim’s family donates organs
Cyclists victims in 4% of accidents
Suspected khair wood thieves die in vehicle accident
sub_h: Two persons suspected to be involved in theft of khair wood from forest in Panchmahal district died in a Road accident. Khair wood was also found inside the vehicle that met with the accident.

h: In Vadodara, 5 of family killed in Road accident
sub_h: Five members of a family were killed after a car rammed into an auto-rickshaw near Narayanwadi on Padra Road late on Thursday night. Three of the deceased were kids. The police said that a speeding car rammed into the auto-rickshaw that was carrying six passengers.

h: 6 die in 2 accidents on highways in Surat
2 die in 2 Road accidents in Diamond City
CA student, four-yr-old girl die in Road accidents
Nine killed in two separate Road accidents in Mahisagar district
sub_h: Six persons died and 36 were injured when a goods carrier they were travelling in collided with a car near Lunawada in Mahisagar district on Wednesday afternoon. The condition of one of the injured was critical.

h: Man lodges complaint against son who died in Road accident in Ahmedabad
sub_h: A father has registered a complaint of rash driving and causing death by negligence against his son, who died in a Road accident on Sindhu Bhavan Road.

h: 75-year-old killed in Road accident in Ahmedabad
sub_h: A 75-year-old woman Nayna Shah, a resident of Paldi, died after she was hit by a speeding car.

h: Ahmedabad third in accidents caused by road work
sub_h: This summarization states that in 2021, Ahmedabad had 201 accidents, the third highest in the country, due to construction work on the roads.

h: A death in every fourth accident in Ahmedabad
sub_h: With the number of vehicles increasing and creaking road infrastructure, the number of Road accident fatalities continued to rise in the city.

h: Three killed in Road accidents in two days
sub_h: Three people have been killed in three Road accidents in the city in the last two days. The accidents took place at Anjali Crossroads, Gota-Ognaj Road and near the Naroda Fire Station.

h: Ahmedabad: Rickshaw driver avoids hitting cow, dies in accident
sub_h: What may be called a case of apathy of the Ahmedabad Municipal Corporation (AMC), a man from Odhav died on Thursday after meeting with a Road accident.

h: Ahmedabad: 3 dead in Road accidents in two days
sub_h: Three people have been killed in three Road accidents in the city in the last two days. The accidents took place at Anjali Crossroads, Gota-Ognaj Road and near the Naroda Fire Station. Police registered cases under IPC Section 304(A) (causing death by negligence) in all three instances.

h: Gujarat: Half of Road accidents in 2021 fatal
sub_h: In the 15,200 road traffic accidents (RTAs) recorded by the state police in 2021, 7,457 persons lost their lives, recording the highest mortality rate at 49% in the past ten years. Five years ago, the mortality rate hovered around 37-38%. While the number of s has dropped in the past two years, the high mortality rate indicates that the crashes have become more lethal.

h: Gujarat: 10 killed, 7 injured after truck hits three-wheeler in Vadodara
sub_h: Ten people were killed and seven others sustained injuries when a truck hit a three-wheeler ferrying passengers on a national highway in Gujarat's Vadodara on Tuesday afternoon.

h: Ahmedabad: 20-year-old killed in Road accident
sub_h: A 20-year-old resident of Navrangpura, Jainish Karchaliya, died during treatment at Sola Civil Hospital after he was hit by an unidentified vehicle on the Iskcon flyover.

h: Ahmedabad: Why are some roads accident-prone?
sub_h: In early April, the city’s road safety council picked a few stretches on the city’s main roads to study what makes them prone to accidents. These included the airport road, the 132 feet Ring Road and Naroda road.

h: Man murdered in fight over Road accident in Jamnagar
sub_h: Five people allegedly murdered a man over a minor Road accident in Jamnagar late on Saturday night. Yogesh Kaushik, brother of the victim Rajesh, told the police that two people hit his car with their bike in Navagam Ghed area and picked up a fight.

h: Gujarat: Three, including a child, die in Road accident near Pavagadh
sub_h: Three persons, including a five-year-old child, died after a car rammed into a divider on the Pavagadh Road on Sunday morning. Such was the impact of the accident that all the three died on the spot and three others suffered injuries.

h: Three students killed in Godhra Road accident
sub_h: Three persons died after the car they were travelling in rammed into a trailer in Godhra taluka of Panchmahal district on Sunday. The deceased were travelling in a car from Madhya Pradesh to their home town in Anand when the incident occurred.

h: Gujarat: Factory owner thrashed, robbed of Rs 2.95 lakh after Road accident in Morbi
sub_h: A ceramic factory owner of Morbi was allegedly thrashed and robbed of Rs 2.95 lakh near Ravapar road in Morbi district on Wednesday night when he was going back to home along with his employee.

h: Elderly man dies in Road accident in Tandalja
sub_h: An elderly man who used to work at a restaurant was killed in a Road accident near the Patrakar Colony in the Tandalja area of the city on Friday night. The deceased Babar Waghela and his wife Nandu Waghela were standing on the side of the road when Babar was run over by a car.

h: Gujarat: Four killed as car collides with truck in Bhavnagar
sub_h: Four persons died when a car in which they were travelling collided with a truck on Nava Bandar road in the outskirts of Bhavnagar in the wee hours of Wednesday.

h: 15-year-old boy dies in Road accident in Surat
sub_h: surat a joyride with friends turned fatal for a 15yearold boy who died after his car crashed into a road divider on ichhaporemagdalla roadthe victim himesh dangar lived in gujarat housing board quarters in amroli and his father kanubhai works as a computer operator with a private firm in sachin areadangar tried contacting himesh on sunday morning but the calls went unansweredhe had gone unansweredhe had gone unansweredhe had...

h: Surat: Five die in separate Road accidents in 24 hours
sub_h: A least five persons died in separate Road accidents in the city in 24 hours ending Monday morning. Rutvik Vasava (21), a resident of Jahangirpura died after the moped he was riding was hit by an autorickshaw from behind near Iscon Circle on Sunday evening.

h: Man dies in freak Road accident
sub_h: A 52-year-old Naranpura resident, identified as Bhadresh Raval, died in a freak accident on Friday. Raval lost control of his scooter, causing the vehicle to hit a divider. As he fell, a speeding vehicle ran over him, killing him on the spot.

h: 3 of Mumbai family killed in Road accident
sub_h: Three members of a family from Kutch, who are settled in Mumbai for many years, were killed in an accident on the Ahmedabad-Kutch highway early on Wednesday.

h: 5 dead, 10 hurt in Road accident
sub_h: Five people were killed and 10 injured after a minivan hit an unidentified vehicle on Dholka-Bagodara highway in the wee hours of Sunday, police said.

h: Two children die in Sachin GIDC Road accidents
sub_h: Two children, aged one year and another three years, were killed in two separate accidents in the Sachin GIDC area on Monday.In the first case, one-year-old Savitri Kalra was run over by a tractor when she was playing near Shree Nilkanth Steel Corporation on Road no. 4.

h: Six killed in three separate Road accidents
Three injured as two groups clash after Road accident in Vadodara
sub_h: The old city area witnessed communal tension late Sunday night after an accident on the Raopura Road. The vehicle owners got into arguments with each other and soon members of two communities joined in.

h: Three, including minor killed in Road accident
sub_h: Three people including a 10-year-old boy died in a Road accident near Kawas in the limits of Ichhapore police station early on Thursday. Two others who were travelling in the ill-fated car were left injured and are currently under treatment at a private hospital.

h: 22-year-old killed in Road accident
Two labourers die in Road accident in Kutch
sub_h: Two casual labourers died after they were knocked down by a pick-up truck in Kutch on Wednesday night.

h: One killed, 15 injured in Road accident
Man dies in Road accident on his birthday
Four Bhavnagar cops die in Road accident near Jaipur
sub_h: Four constables of Bhavnagar police who were returning from Delhi after detaining a theft accused died in a Road accident that occurred near Jaipur on Tuesday. The bodies of the victims were brought to Bhavnagar in a special flight late at night.

h: Doctor dies in Road accident in Dahod
sub_h: A young orthopedic surgeon died in a Road accident in Dahod district while returning from Madhya Pradesh around Saturday midnight.

h: Four die in two Road accidents
Surat: Businessman held for killing teenagers in Road accident
sub_h: Police investigation into the accidental deaths of two teenage boys on Vesu Canal Road revealed that a textile businessman knocked them to death on August 24.

h: Ahmedabad: Three dead, 13 hurt in Road accident in Sanand
sub_h: Three persons died and 13 sustained injuries when a car hit a chhakdo near Rethal village in Sanand taluka of Ahmedabad district on Sunday, said a police officer.

h: Three migrant workers die in Road accident
60-year-old killed in Road accident
Nine of Ahmedabad family injured in Road accident
sub_h: Nine members of a family from Ahmedabad were injured after the mini bus they were travelling in overturned near Nani Mordi village in Chotila taluka of Surendranagar district in the wee hours of Saturday.

h: Gujarat: 4 killed, 2 injured after van on way to temple overturns in Kheda
sub_h: Four people were killed and two others seriously injured after their van overturned in Gujarat's Kheda district, police said on Wednesday.

h: Road accident fatality rate up from 12% in 2013 to 31% in Ahmedabad
sub_h: With every passing year, a greater proportion of Road accidents in the city have involved a death. This is apparent from city traffic police data, which shows that while 12% of accidents involved a death in 2013, the figure was 31% by 2021.

h: Children become victims of Road accidents near home
Three youths killed in Road accident in Dhoraji town
sub_h: Breaking traffic rules proved fatal for three youths as they were killed in a Road accident in Dhoraji town of Rajkot district on Sunday late night.

h: Four killed in two separate Road accidents in Saurashtra
22% decrease in Road accidents in Gujarat
sub_h: While the months of lockdown recorded dip in the road traffic accident (RTA) cases due to restricted movement of vehicles, the rest of the months regained the normal numbers, revealed the analysis of cases by EMRI 108 emergency services.

h: Five die in Road accident
Two dead, seven hurt as truck rams into car
sub_h: Two persons were killed and seven others injured when a speeding truck rammed into the car in which the victims were travelling from behind near Limbdi town on Rajkot-Ahmedabad highway on Wednesday late evening.

h: Rajkot: Homeopathy college student killed in Road accident
sub_h: A 21-year-old student of homeopathic medicine died in a hit-and-run case near Rajkot city on Monday evening. The deceased was identified as Parimal Soheliya, a native of Paddhari town in Rajkot. He was studying in the third year of BHMS course at a Rajkot-based homeopathy college.

h: Ragpicker dies in Road accident in Sarkhej
Four labourers die in Road accident
sub_h: Four labourers from Rajasthan died and one other was injured after they were hit by an unidentified vehicle near Maliya railway crossing on the outskirts Morbi town early Thursday morning.

h: Seven killed in two Road accidents
Gujarat: 10 killed in car-truck collision in Anand district
sub_h: Ten persons were killed after their car collided with a truck coming from the opposite direction near Indranaj village in Gujarat's Anand district on Wednesday morning, police said.

h: Two women killed in Road accident
Gujarat: Three killed in Road accident
Three Covid volunteers die in Road accident near Vadodara
sub_h: Three persons from Surat who were returning after volunteering for Covid-19 work in Saurashtra died in a Road accident on their way back home. The car in which the victims were travelling ran into a truck leading to the incident.

h: 3 Covid volunteers from Surat die in Road accident
Man killed in Road accident in Vadodara
sub_h: A 40-year-old man was killed and his son and wife injured in a head-on collision between a bike and a car on canal road near Bhimpura village in Vadodara on November 17.

h: 13,456 deaths in Road accidents in 2 years
Gujarat: Leopard cub dies in Amreli Road accident
sub_h: A leopard cub, aged three to five months, died in a Road accident in Savarkundla village of Amreli district of Gujarat on Wednesday.

h: Gujarat: Man, wife, two-year-old son killed in Road accident
sub_h: A couple and their two-year-old son were killed on Saturday when their motorcycle was hit by a speeding truck in Gujarat's Amreli district, police said. The incident happened on the outskirts of Rajula town here when the man, his wife and son were on their way to Chotra village, an official said.

h: 46% of Ahmedabad’s roads are prone to Road accidents
sub_h: Don’t be surprised, nearly 46% of the total 2,600km city road length is prone to road crash. This observation was made in a recent study by the city traffic department and Cept University.

h: Gujarat: 21,000 died in Road accidents in 3 years
sub_h: Despite the government’s tall claims of increasing road safety, official figures presented in the Gujarat assembly show that more than 21,000 persons died in Road accidents in the state during the past three years.

h: Gujarat: Over 21,000 killed in Road accidents in three years
sub_h: As per the data shared by the state home department in the assembly on Wednesday, as many as 21,529 people have died and 46,146 sustained injuries in Road accidents in the last three years as on September 2020.

h: 11 of family killed in Road accident in Vadodara
sub_h: This story originally appeared in AhmedabadMirror on November 19, 2020

h: Two killed in Road accident in Dhoraji
Road accident turns out to be murder
sub_h: A Road accident turned out to be a murder case when the accused on Saturday confessed before police that he had rammed his MUV into a motorcycle with the intention to kill its rider on Jamnagar bypass on August 17.

h: Lunawada executive magistrate, driver killed in Road accident
sub_h: Lunawada executive magistrate and his driver were killed in a Road accident near Khalaspur village in Panchmahal district in the early hours on Saturday.

h: Gujarat man gets wife killed in road 'accident' to claim insurance
sub_h: A chartered accountant from Gujarat's Banaskantha district has been arrested for allegedly killing his wife and making it look like a Road accident in order to claim Rs 60 lakh as insurance, police said on Saturday.

h: 7-year-old boy killed in Road accident
Gujarat: Woman killed for Rs 63 lakh life insurance money
sub_h: Crime branch sleuths on Wednesday cracked the mysterious death of 21-year-old woman and found that she was killed by her husband Anuj alias Monu with help of another person.

h: Gujarat: Surat bizman among three killed in Road accident near Morbi
sub_h: A Surat-based businessman and two others were killed when the SUV they were travelling in rammed into a truck from behind near Chirai village, about 15km from Morbi town on Wednesday afternoon.

h: Vadodara: Youth due to get married next month killed in Road accident
sub_h: A 22-year-old man who was set to get married next month died in a Road accident on Padra-Jambusar Road on Monday afternoon.

h: Toddler dies after Road accident
Gujarat: Toddler, teen, 2 others killed as car hits autorickshaw
sub_h: A toddler, a 14-year-old girl and two others were killed and three persons were injured on Tuesday when their autorickshaw was hit by a car on Dholka- Bagodara highway near Khanpur village in Ahmedabad, police said.

h: Two die in Bodeli accident
sub_h: Two persons died in a gruesome Road accident between a truck and a motorcycle near Bodeli on Tuesday evening.

h: Two die in Road accident near Dhrol
Ahmedabad: Policeman killed in Road accident
Seven die in car-dumper collision in Gujarat's Patdi
sub_h: : Seven people including three children were charred to death in a horrific accident near Patdi in Surendrangar district in wee hours of Saturday. All the victims were the residents of Patan district.

h: Four dead, one injured after car collides with tree in Gujarat's Surendrangar
sub_h: Four persons, including three women, died and one person was injured after a car in which they were travelling collided with a tree on Surendrangar-Lakhtar road on Wednesday morning.

h: Surat bizman among 3 killed in Road accident
Gujarat: 8 dead, 22 injured in bus-tanker-jeep collision
sub_h: Eight people were killed and 22 others were injured on Monday in a collision involving a state transport bus, a tanker and a jeep in Gujarat's Tapi district, police said.

h: Surat: Dead woman’s kin suspect foul play in Road accident
sub_h: Ten days after a 21-year-old woman died mysteriously in a Road accident, the city police have begun detailed investigation to the incident after her family member alleged foul play by her husband and in-laws, reportedly to get her Rs 63 lakh insurance claim.

h: Gujarat: Businessman dies in Road accident
sub_h: A businessman from Savli died and two others were injured after an SUV they were all travelling in collided head on with a dumper truck near Lasundra village on Saturday midnight.

h: Gujarat: Four of a family killed in car-truck collision
sub_h: Four members of a family died while three others sustained injuries when a truck collided with the car they were travelling in on Amreli-Bagasra Road in Gujarat on Monday evening.

h: Ahmedabad: Runner hurt in Road accident
sub_h: A 36-year-old man, who was a participant in a run organized by a private firm, was injured when a speeding pick-up van hit him near Sindhu Bhavan Road on Sunday morning.

h: Road accidents claimed 39k lives in Gujarat in 5 years
Four of family killed in MP Road accident cremated
sub_h: Even as the bodies of four persons who died in a Road accident near Dhar in Madhya Pradesh were brought to the city, the fifth person remains to be critically injured at a hospital in Indore.

h: Gujarat: Deesa CA insures wife for Rs 60 lakh, stages murder as Road accident
sub_h: It could very well be termed as a cold-blooded murder. A chartered accountant (CA) in Deesa town of Banaskantha was arrested on Friday for killing his wife with help of his friend and making it appear as an accident to claim Rs 60 lakh insurance money.

h: Two killed in SUV-truck collision
Surat: Head constable killed in Road accident
Gujarati film actor, friend die in Road accident
Woman driving to Surat from Junagadh dies in Road accident
Two killed in Road accident in Mundra
Gujarat: Three killed, 11 injured in Road accident
sub_h: Three persons were killed and 11 injured in a head on collision between two SUVs on Mata na Madh Road near Nakhatrana in Kutch district on Sunday evening.

h: Ahmedabad: Road accidents down but fatalities rising
sub_h: The city in 2018 had recorded 308 fatal accidents, according to FIRs filed by Ahmedabad police. Over 80% of the victims were either pedestrians or two-wheeler riders.

h: Six dead, 20 injured as bus overturns in Gujarat
sub_h: Six persons were killed and at least 20 others injured after a private bus in which they were travelling overturned in Junagadh district of Gujarat on Saturday, police said. The mishap occurred at Lalpur village in Visavadar taluka in the afternoon, police said.

h: Ahmedabad: Bullet in the head, but Road accident for police
sub_h: A man who had been shot in the head was noted as a Road accident victim in police files. Now, a crime branch informer has made police literally excavate the truth

h: Waghodiya couple killed in Road accident, kids survive
sub_h: A couple from Waghodiya died while their two children were injured in a Road accident near Jambuva crossroads on national highway-48 on Sunday midnight.

h: Surat: Brain-dead NRI woman redeems donation pledge
sub_h: A 56-year-old brain-dead NRI woman redeemed her pledge of donating her organs which she had undertaken in 2018. True to her promise, US national Shila Desai, who met with a Road accident in Valsad, gave fresh lease of life to five people after her family donated her organs in the city on Saturday.

h: One death a day, two accidents every hour in Ahmedabad
sub_h: In the first 313 days of the year, city has lost 354 lives due to road traffic accidents (RTA), revealed figures by city traffic branch. Further analysis revealed that the western city parts accounted for 107 deaths.
